enchantment.alexsmobsinteraction.stabili: Stabilizes the players hotbar when facing a Farseer
enchantment.alexsmobsinteraction.trample: Tramples any that get in the Tusklin when ridden
enchantment.alexsmobsinteraction.final_s: Allows the user to stun charging/pouncing mobs at the cost of significant damage to Shield Durability
enchantment.alexsmobsinteraction.lightwe: Makes tamed Cosmaws suffer no penalty when carrying heavy players
enchantment.alexsmobsinteraction.rolling: Allows to roll-through liquids for the rocky chestplate
